name: Alphabitizzy
description:
Created in a single evening for 8 Bits to Infinity's Mundane Jam, Alphabetizzy challenges you to organize a bookshelf as fast as possible.

CREDITS...

Made in Delphi RADstudio

Logo made at cooltext.com

Sources of words for randomly generated book titles: 

Names - namecensus.com

Adjectives - patternbasedwriting.com

Nouns - wordexample.com
